-| wi(w0, wss(c2, c4))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, c4))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(clspn, c5))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(clsm, c5))

comment: Subspace sum (in its extended domain) is a subset of the span of the union of its arguments. (Contributed by NM, 6-Aug-2014.)
